channel.title: r on Martin Jung - Environmental and data scientist
channel.description: Recent content in r on Martin Jung - Environmental and data scientist

item.title: Running rstudio in the Google cloud - [2]
item.description: In this new post I will go through my process of getting familiar with running R in the Google cloud and the posting sort of follows my previous post on getting started with the Google cloud. My dream setup would include to being able to switch seamless between running r code locally or in the cloud whenever I require more processing power. For instance similar doAzureParallel package available for Microsoft Azure.
